hero.title: Authentic Mexican Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Experience the true flavors of Mexico at Taco Shop in Reno, Nevada.

important.announcement: Family-owned and operated in the heart of downtown Reno.
important.highlight: Authentic Mexican cuisine in the heart of Reno, Nevada.

about.heading: Fresh & Authentic
paragraphs: At Taco Shop, we pride ourselves on serving the most authentic Mexican cuisine in Reno. Our recipes have been passed down through generations, bringing the true flavors of Mexico to your plate.
We use only the freshest ingredients, locally sourced when possible, to create delicious tacos, burritos, and more that will transport your taste buds straight to Mexico.

sections.title: TACOS
sections.description: Soft corn tortillas, choice of salsa: roja, verde or pico
sections.pricing: No mix & match · 2 for $7 or 3 for $10
